display_long_description:
Supersonic League brings the excitement of RC spaceships and soccer (football) to a whole new level in a mixed reality experience that fans of Rocket League will instantly recognize and love. Display a gravity-free arena right in your space - perfectly sized for a tabletop - and dive into intense matches against AI opponents.

In this single-player adventure (with multiplayer modes coming soon), you'll navigate your RC spaceship to hit the ball, pull off jaw-dropping aerials, and score goals. The game’s physics-driven mechanics demand skill, precision, and creativity, taking full advantage of the gravity-free environment where walls become part of your strategy, just like in your favorite fast-paced, futuristic soccer games.

Featuring:
- Tabletop Mixed Reality Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a hovering arena you can place anywhere.
- Physics-Based Action: Master spaceship control to perform epic plays and dominate the match.
- 3 Difficulty Levels: Progress through increasing challenges and sharpen your skills.
- Weekly Leaderboards: Compete to secure the top spot against other players.
- Upcoming Multiplayer Modes: Online and local multiplayer will let you battle friends in the same space or across the globe.

Whether you’re a fan of RC vehicles, soccer, or love the competitive chaos of Rocket League, Supersonic League offers a unique experience that will keep your heart racing. Will you rise to the top and claim your spot as a Supersonic champion?
